name: Nosey Jumpers
description:
Nosey McNostril, the main character in the game, is on a quest to conquer the Golden Crown. Every level holds a key to the next level. Collect jewels, coins and diamonds along the 10 available worlds:
-Nosey Forest, a green and enchanted forest
-Sniffy Planet, full of green little aliens
-Smelly Fish Tank, where you will fish your way to the next level
-Spooky Snout House, where you will find the evil witch and her legion of ghosts
-Pirates of the Noseyrean, where you will fight off pirates
-Roman Nostrils, where you will battle gladiators
-Bakery Beaks, where sweets are not that sweet
-Nosey Lab, where the wicked scientist is concocting evil creations
-Sneezy Structure, a construction site full of nosey workers
-Nosey Hell, where you will face off the Master Evil and its little devils
